bill_title: increase the state's percentage of video lottery net machine income and to revise the allocation of the revenue.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the state's percentage of video lottery net machine income and to revise the allocation of the revenue. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 42-7A-63 be amended to read as follows: 42-7A-63. The commission shall maximize revenues to the state from video lottery. The state's percentage of net machine income shall be fifty seventy percent. The state's percentage of net machine income shall be directly deposited to the property tax reduction fund, except for one-half : (1) Two percent of the net machine income received by the state shall be deposited in the coordinated natural resources conservation fund; (2) Ten percent of the net machine income received by the state shall be deposited in the state general fund for the purpose of funding medical services administered by the Department of Social Services; (3) Sixteen percent of the net machine income received by the state shall be deposited in the local government highway and bridge fund; and (4) Four-tenths of one percent of net machine income authorized for deposit into received by the state shall be deposited in the video lottery operating fund. The effective date of this section is July 1, 1996.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
